transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello Good afternoon sir Nilesh sir baat kare
Customer: ha ji ji Nilesh sir mai India mart se baat kar raha tha
Executive: ha ji ha bolo na mai bol raha tha mai India mart se baat kar raha tha aapne sir customer call pe wo call karke bataya aapko nahi aa rahi
Customer: bilkul mere ko kya lag raha hai mere ko jo dhoti ya uske jo regarding me jo lead aa rahi hai na
Executive: theek hai wo sab south ki aa rahi hai north ki aa hi nahi rahi hai ya maharashtra ya maharashtra se upar ke baju me
Customer: okay okay abhi mai aapka na wo dekh leta hu ki aap jo hai mainly aap kis location se valid consume kar rahe ho kya hota hai na ki usi location se fir aane lag jata hai abhi jo aapka na preference ban rakha hai by lead aane ka wo 15 cities ban rakha hai theek hai ek to sir pune hai ek mumbai hai hyderabad hai bengaluru hai jaipur thane ye kolhapur ahmedabad surat varanasi indore kolkata nagpur vadodra aur jalna hai 15 cities
Customer: Rajasthan ka naam nahi hai usme
Executive: ha kya bataye sir
Customer: Rajasthan Rajasthan Rajasthan isme ban nahi rakha hai sir by lead agar aap consume karte ho na Rajasthan ka theek hai to aayega isse abhi kya ho rakha hai aapka jo by lead ban rakha hai
Executive: koi baat nahi mai ji ji aapka jo hai concern kya kya hai mai wo samajh lo ek to sir aap bata rahe ho location ka theek hai uske alava batao sir location ka mai aapko wo theek kara dunga uska kya tha preference wagera mai wo bana dunga aapka aapko jis jis cities ka chahiye na us cities me aapko jyada valid consume karna hoga aur jis cities ka aapko nahi chahiye south ka nahi chahiye to mai usko unmark kar deta hu matlab ki location jo hai expected to wo exempt kar deta hu usme theek hai hata deta hu
Customer: south ka south ka mera mera nahi jam raha hai kam aur hoega bhi nahi wo
Executive: south ka kam nahi jamega na hoga theek hai mai samajh gaya abhi apna jo hai sir maharashtra se theek hai to mainly aapko sir north me jaise ki man lo sir UP aa gaya sir theek hai idhar bihar taraf aa gaya delhi bhi aa gaya sir idhar upar agar jaye sir jammu kashmir is side aapko jyada matlab ki aapko karna hai aapke khayal se barabar aur niche jaise chennai kolkata sorry chennai ho gaya sir aapka bengaluru ho gaya in sab idhar nahi jana aapko
Customer: nahi nahi idhar dikhta hi nahi mal mera ye
Executive: bilkul mai aapka wo bhi mai dekh leta hu products se related me ye batao sir by lead jo aapko aa rahi hai wo uski quality kaisi hai matlab ki deal nahi ho pa rahi hai lekin quality to sahi aa rahi hai na
Customer: ha quality bhi aa rahi hai lekin kuch to alag hi aa raha hai sab mere ko pehle jo ek mahine pehle jo chal raha tha barabar
Executive: acha pichle 15 din se kuch jam nahi raha hai ye
Customer: theek hai sir aapne cotton shawls jo hai product aapne dal rakha hai theek hai barabar wo bhi rahega sir product aapke pass
Executive: hai na wo to continue hai ha but isme sir aapne not relevant wo aapne dal rakha hai product se related kya kya dala hai
Customer: matlab ki aapko uski lead nahi chahiye not preferred category me aap usko dal rakhe ho cotton ka cotton shawls jo peela peela patti dikh raha hai baju me wo
Executive: ek second peela patti nahi cotton shawls jo keywords hai uski baat kar raha hu mai sir ek peela jo aapne dal rakha hai ek cotton dhoti dal rakha hai theek hai ek kam karta hu sir ek sir video meeting kar leta hu aapse na kyuki keywords wagera pe bhi kam kar lete hai theek hai mujhe ye batao sir review rating wagera bhi le rahe ho sir aap customer se
Customer: sorry
Executive: review ratings customer se lete ho aap
Customer: nahi nahi but koi baat nahi sir rating aapka fir bhi bahut acha chal raha hai panch ka rating chal raha hai jo ki char customer ne aapko diya hai theek hai kafi acha hai sir abhi in sab se deal hua hai kya sir aap kuch bata sakte hai october ke baad
Executive: sab unhone diya hai aapka devendra ji hai kunal hai ashutosh aapka deep hai teen char se ho raha hai teen char din se to hua hai okay okay unka bhi hai maine full abhi is month me hua hai sir is month me is month me nahi hua yahi bol raha hu 14 15 ek tarikh se hai na kuch to nahi aa raha hai isme mere ko wahi samajh me nahi aa raha hai aisa kyu ho raha hai
Customer: acha sir koi issue nahi hai sir mai aapko sir ek video link bhej raha hu aap sir join ho jao theek hai abhi hai na sir abhi system pe hai na sir aap
Executive: system me me mobile pe hu acha mobile mobile pe hi chalate hai aap sir mobile pe hi chalata hu acha koi issue nahi hai sir mai aapko dekho link bhej diya hu register mail id pe aapko jayega sir hmm ek minute
Customer: are yaar wo bachi ka mail id hoga acha whatsapp kar do kya sir aapko ha chalega to whatsapp karo na ya to whatsapp kar ya fir abhi abhi phone me konsa mail id hai aap wo mail id bata do mai wo dal deta hu n i l e s h
Executive: n i l e s h nilesh n p national transport n t national transport ye national transport dalna hai kya nilesh national transport nilesh nt nt acha acha nilesh nt 2006 2006 ha @gmail.com
Customer: theek hai sir mai aapko sir gmail pe bhej diya aapke hmm
Executive: mai check karta hu dekhna sir ek bar gaya
Customer: nahi aaya ek second
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting North region buyleads.

- Quality of buyleads has decreased recently.



Resolution:

- Executive checked the customer's location preferences.

- Executive offered to set up a video meeting.

- Executive took customer's email ID to share link.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will share video meeting link.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, location, quality, video meeting, keywords
